summary: This bill, the "Pay Our Border Patrol and Customs Agents Act", addresses the payment of salaries for U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) employees during a government shutdown in fiscal year 2026. It mandates appropriation of necessary funds to pay Agents of the U.S. Border Patrol and officers of the Office of Field Operations who are exempt from furlough during a lapse in discretionary appropriations. The bill was introduced by Ms. De La Cruz and others and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.
